Name: Escape Master
About the game: This is a completely free jailbreak adventure casual game. You can pass the level after completing the designated tasks, but be careful with the guards on patrol. After the character is upgraded, you can improve your own attributes, such as movement, stamina, intelligence, etc., as well as various fun props and blessing systems. Come and try the challenge! -The latest update (12.24): 1. Now supports joystick operation! It is recommended to use a joystick. 2. Add Christmas theme style displays and items. -Achievement system Complete challenges to get achievement rewards -Blessing Rescue the hostages and get blessing rewards -Prop use Use items to obtain corresponding effects -Character style Choose different character styles -Character attribute points Get attribute points for character upgrades, and customize character attributes -Shop In the game, a mystery shop will appear every few levels to buy your favorite items
